name: Corona scene
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using the Corona renderer.

name: VRay or Arnold scene
description: This job will render different frames of a 3ds max scene in parallel using the VRay or Arnold renderer.

name: VRay Distributed Render
description: This job will render frames across multiple nodes using VRay Distributed Rendering.

name: VRay Distributed Pool
description: This will create a VRay DR Pool that can be used from 3ds Max.  After creating the DR Pool you must submit a VRay DR Job to start the required VRay DR services.
